creator: nick.booth@oberon-media.com
text:
I am using Tomcat to Run Jira.  About 4 weeks ago Tomcat stopped creating a 
new stdout log everyday and I have no idea why, what changed and most 
importantly how to fix it.  I spent time talking to Jira support and they said 
it is a problem with apache tomcat.  This is a porblem because Jira makes 
these huge logs in stdout that need to be deleted.  And because apache is not 
creating a new log everyday I have to stop it delete the log and then 
restart.  I don't like having to shutdown Jira every 4-5 days even if its for 
a few seconds to delete the log.  

Can you please help me to get tomcat to create a new stdout log everyday?  Do 
you know how I can stop the massive amount of loging coming from Jira?  It is 
worthless information and Jira support said that there is no way to stop it.  
Maybe there is something I can do in tomcat.

Let me know if there is any information I can get you about my configuration.
